Vaccinating Billions Means Finding Ways Around Patent Impasse
India’s proposed WTO waiver faces stiff opposition from the U.S. & EU. But pressure is growing on #COVID19 #vaccine producers to make concessions to ensure billions get inoculated.
via @business
